Ocr dependencies cannot be downloaded due to low device storage Ocr Detector Sample Click "Detect Text" to detect text Detect Text Auto Focus Use Flash Text read successfully No text captured "Error reading text: %1$s" Skip Welcome in Book in Hand. \n \n Get all the informations you want before getting a book.
